special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: CAPTAIN MARVEL
special_powers.description: FREE: If Captain Marvel began your turn on the map, replace her with another character with this trait.

special_powers.name: ALIEN STRENGTH PUNCHES
special_powers.description: Quake. When Captain Marvel uses it, after resolutions any hit targets that didn't take damage from the attack are dealt 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: KREE SUPREMACY: ELITE FORCES
special_powers.description: Once per turn, when a friendly character that's adjacent or has the Kree keyword rolls for break away and the result is a [1], you may reroll that die. If that friendly character is both adjacent and has the Kree keyword, instead you may reroll a result of [1] or [2].

special_powers.name: SECRET INVASION: WHO DO YOU TRUST
special_powers.description: If Skrull Warrior occupies hindering terrain, increase the result of his Shape Change rolls by +1. // Adjacent opposing characters can't use Leadership or be carried.

special_powers.name: HIDDEN, UNTIL THEY'RE NOT
special_powers.description: Sidestep, Stealth.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: SUPER SPY
special_powers.description: Nick Fury starts the game with 3 Tradecraft tokens. FREE: Remove a Tradecraft token to choose [Improved Targeting: Hindering] or [Improved Movement: Hindering]. Nick Fury can use that ability until your next turn.

special_powers.name: WE ONLY GET ONE SHOT, PEOPLE
special_powers.description: Leadership. When Nick Fury or an adjacent friendly character attacks (before the attack roll), you may remove a Tradecraft token. If you do, opposing effects can't reroll that attack roll.

special_powers.name: KREE SUPREMACY: DEEP COVER
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - Friendly characters that are adjacent or have the Kree keyword modify defense +1 against close attacks. If that character is both adjacent and has the Kree keyword, they also modify defense +1 against range attacks.

special_powers.name: KREE SUPREMACY: FOR HALA!
special_powers.description: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, when a friendly character that's adjacent or has the Kree keyword hits, Action Total +1. If that character is both adjacent and has the Kree keyword, Action Total +2 instead.

special_powers.name: MANDROID ARMOR
special_powers.description: Incapacitate, Telekinesis.

special_powers.name: KREE SUPREMACY: PEERLESS WARRIORS
special_powers.description: Once per turn, for all characters with this trait, when an opposing character rolls to break away from friendly characters that are adjacent or have the Kree keyword and the result is a [6], you may reroll that die. If at least one of those friendly characters is both adjacent and has the Kree keyword, instead you may reroll a result of [5] or [6].

special_powers.name: SECRET INVASION: WE'VE LEARNED ALL ABOUT YOU
special_powers.description: If Skrull Technician occupies hindering terrain, increase the result of his Shape Change rolls by +1. // Once per turn, when an opposing character within range would use Outwit, Perplex, or Probability Control, you may roll a d6. [5-6]: That character can't use that power until your next turn.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: ALWAYS BEEN A COLLECTOR
special_powers.description: Phil Coulson starts the game with 3 Tradecraft tokens. When an equipment-object would be dropped or KO'd, you may remove 2 Tradecraft tokens to instead equip that equipment to Phil Coulson or an adjacent friendly character.

special_powers.name: I LOVE THESE OLD SPY GIZMOS
special_powers.description: Precision Strike. FREE: Remove a Tradecraft token and KO a standard object held by Phil Coulson or an adjacent friendly character. If you do, the character that was holding the object chooses a standard attack power to use this turn.

special_powers.name: SHIFTING FOCUS: CAPTAIN MARVEL
special_powers.description: FREE: If Captain Marvel began your turn on the map, replace her with another character with this trait.

special_powers.name: FULL-SPECTRUM
special_powers.description: Penetrating/Psychic Blast with 3 [TARGETS]. When Captain Marvel uses it, after resolutions any hit targets that didn't take damage from the attack are dealt 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: KREE SUPREMACY: SUPERIOR TECHNOLOGY
special_powers.description: Friendly characters that are adjacent or have the Kree keyword have Protected: Outwit on their speed powers. If that friendly character is both adjacent and has the Kree keyword, they also have Protected: Outwit on their attack powers.

special_powers.name: SECRET INVASION: WE COULD BE ANYONE
special_powers.description: If Talos occupies hindering terrain, increase the result of his Shape Change rolls by +1. // Adjacent opposing characters can't use team abilities.

special_powers.name: WITHIN MY GRASP
special_powers.description: Charge, Plasticity, Stealth, Giant Reach: 2.

special_powers.name: REFORMATIVE SHIFTING
special_powers.description: Regeneration. When Talos uses it, he heals 1 additional click.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: THE SPYMASTER
special_powers.description: Leadership. Nick Fury starts the game with 5 Tradecraft tokens. FREE: Remove a Tradecraft token to choose an opposing character within line of fire. That character can't have their combat values positively modified until your next turn.

special_powers.name: GOING DARK
special_powers.description: Sidestep, Stealth. FREE: Remove a Tradecraft token to move Nick Fury or an adjacent friendly character up to half their speed value.

special_powers.name: NO ONE EVER REALLY DIES...
special_powers.description: STOP. When this power is first revealed, remove all Tradecraft tokens and heal Nick Fury that many clicks.

special_powers.name: KREE SUPREMACY: EMPOWERED BY SUPERIOR TECHNOLOGY
special_powers.description: Friendly characters that are adjacent or have the Kree keyword have Protected: Outwit on their defense powers. If that friendly characters is both adjacent and has the Kree keyword, they also have Protected: Outwit on their damage powers.

special_powers.name: KREE SUPREMACY: WE SHALL WIN THIS WAR
special_powers.description: Friendly characters that are adjacent or have the Kree keyword modify attack +1 when targeting only characters that can use Shape Change or stealth. If that friendly character is both adjacent and has the Kree keyword, it can use Improved Targeting: Hindering and Improved Targeting: Characters.

special_powers.name: PSYCHE-MAGNITRON
special_powers.description: Empower, Enhancement, Ranged Combat Expert.

special_powers.name: KREE SUPREMACY: LIVE KREE OR DIE!
special_powers.description: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, when a friendly character that's adjacent or has the Kree keyword is KO'd, after resolutions you may deal 1 damage to each opposing character that was adjacent to the KO'd character. If that friendly character is both adjacent and has the Kree keyword, the damage dealt is penetrating.

special_powers.name: LUNATIC LEGION
special_powers.description: Charge, Flurry, KNOCKBACK.

special_powers.name: SECRET INVASION: WE ARE ALREADY HERE
special_powers.description: If Skrull Scientist occupies hindering terrain, increase the result of his Shape Change rolls by +1. // When an opposing character is KO'd by an attack, after resolutions you may place Skrull Scientist in, or adjacent to, that character's square. If you do, he gains Immune until your next turn.

special_powers.name: HIDDEN IN PLAIN SIGHT
special_powers.description: FREE: Place Skrull Scientist in, or adjacent to, the square of an unheld object within range, then KO that object.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE: MANKIND'S SHIELD
special_powers.description: Phil Coulson starts the game with 5 Tradecraft tokens. FREE: Remove a Tradecraft token to choose a standard damage poiwer for Phil Coulson to use until your next turn.

special_powers.name: HARD LIGHT SHIELD BUILT INTO THE HAND
special_powers.description: Energy Shield/Deflection. FREE: Remove a Tradecraft token to choose an adjacent character. Until your next turn, that character can use Energy Shield/Deflection if they are adjacent to Phil Coulson.

special_powers.name: ZEPHYR ONE
special_powers.description: Stealth, [Wing symbol], PASSENGER: 4. Phil Coulson does not modify his speed value from use of the Carry ability.

special_powers.name: IT'S A MAGICAL PLACE
special_powers.description: Stop. When this power is first revealed, remove all Tradecraft tokens and heal Phil Coulson that many clicks.

special_powers.name: KREE SUPREMACY: YOU SHALL NOT ESCAPE
special_powers.description: When a friendly character that's adjacent or has the Kree keyword hits, after resolutions that character may move 1 square. If that friendly character is both adjacent and has the Kree keyword, instead all friendly characters with the Kree keyword may move 1 square.

special_powers.name: TARGET LOCATED
special_powers.description: Precision Strike. When Korath uses it, friendly characters can use Precision Strike this turn, but only to target that hit character.

special_powers.name: KREE SUPREMACY: YOU STAND ACCUSED
special_powers.description: POWER: If no friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character that dealt damage to a friendly character that's adjacent or has the Kree keyword since your last turn. Place Ronan adjacent to that opposing character, then make a close attack that deals penetrating damage targeting that character.

special_powers.name: IF YOU STAND WITH THE GUILTY, YOU WILL SHARE THEIR FATE
special_powers.description: Close Combat Expert. When Ronan uses it and hits, after resolutions he may use it again at no cost to target a character he hasn't hit this turn. (He may repeat this if he keeps hitting)

special_powers.name: ENERGY ABSORPTION
special_powers.description: When Captain Marvel takes 2 or more damage from a single attack, after resolutions note her current click number and then turn her to click #11. (If she would be KO'd she can't turn to click #11.)

special_powers.name: KREE SUPREMACY: COSMIC AWARENESS
special_powers.description: Friendly characters that are adjacent or have the Kree keyword have PROTECTED: Opposing Probability Control. If a friendly character is both adjacent and has the Kree keyword, it can use Probability Control, but only to target itself.

special_powers.name: STRAFING RUN
special_powers.description: [Improved Movement: Characters], Running Shot. When Captain Marvel uses it, after resolutions she may use Charge at no cost, but can't target the same character.

special_powers.name: SUPER-CHARGED
special_powers.description: Impervious, Colossal Stamina. At the end of your turn or if Captain Marvel would be KO'd, return her to the most recently noted click number. Protected: Outwit, Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: CONTINUITY
special_powers.description: When Carol Danvers, Fearless is KO'd, for the rest of the game, friendly characters can't use team abilities.

special_powers.name: CALLING IN THE AIR STRIKE
special_powers.description: FREE: This turn, [Improved Targeting: Ignores Elevated, Destroys Blocking] and modify range +2.

special_powers.name: PROVIDE COVERING FIRE
special_powers.description: FREE: This turn when an adjacent friendly character hits with a range attack, if Carol Danvers, Fearless has line of fire to the target, after resolutions you may give that hit character an action token.

special_powers.name: OR (-6) PSYCHE-MAGNITRON
special_powers.description: FREE: Replace Carol Danvers, Fearless with CMM #001 Captain Marvel or CMM #010 Captain Marvel (on your Sideline). If you spend 6 plot points, you may replace her with CMM #021 Captain Marvel instead. (Title Characters can be replaced by their own effect.)
